title: Dark & Day
description: Journey to a world torn between Dark & Day! It is earth like you have never seen it; a sphere of mythical creatures, epic adventures and lurking mysteries!Jonothon Wyer is the scrawniest kid in the Twilight Ring. His only hope to become healthy & whole is to join the army of the Empress of the Dark End. On his last fateful wake at home, Jono makes an unexpected discovery that thrusts him into the center of an age old conflict between the Dark & Day.Join Jono as he learns to trust new friends, outwit mythical monsters, explore amazing realms and uncover the terrible mystery that is tearing the world apart!
author: Israel Grey
